channel.title: Comments on: Custom wordpress full width page template (Twenty Twelve theme)

item.title: By: Аlex
item.dc:creator: Аlex
item.content:encoded:
Thank you! I am looking for this week.I had to make a wide page in the Twenty Twelve theme.I wrote a new style
.full-width {
width: 100%;
}
It turned out great!

item.title: By: James Bullis
item.dc:creator: James Bullis
item.description: Thanks for posting this. I still have a client using a 2012 Child theme and this is exactly what I was looking for.
item.content:encoded: Thanks for posting this. I still have a client using a 2012 Child theme and this is exactly what I was looking for.
